research_brief:
{
  "Product/Service Name": "BotSpot",
  "Core Value Proposition (USP)": "Empowers users to create and deploy AI trading agents and profitable strategies in seconds, automatically, with no coding required, revolutionizing access to automated finance.",
  "Target Audience": "Individuals interested in automated trading, investing, or leveraging AI for financial gains, particularly those without coding experience or seeking efficient, hands-off investment solutions.",
  "Top 5 Key Features": [
    "Rapid creation and deployment of AI trading agents (in seconds)",
    "Builds fully automated trading bots",
    "Enables creation of profitable trading strategies",
    "Requires no coding for bot development",
    "Bots operate and trade 24/7"
  ],
  "Brand Tone": "Innovative, Empowering, Efficient, Accessible, Revolutionary",
  "Industry": "FinTech, Artificial Intelligence, Automated Trading, Finance",
  "Competitors Mentioned": "None",
  "One-Sentence Pitch": "BotSpot allows anyone to instantly create and deploy AI trading bots to generate profitable strategies automatically, running 24/7 without a single line of code."
}
